headline: IDF thwarts weapons smuggling attempt
description: IDF troops positioned at the Hawara roadblock, south of Nablus, nabbed a 16-year-old Palestinian youth who had attempted to smuggle weapons.   A makeshift gun and bomb were found on the youth, who said during his investigation that he had planned to smuggle the weapons to the other side of the roadblock. (Efrat Weiss)
articleBody: IDF troops positioned at the Hawara roadblock, south of Nablus, nabbed a 16-year-old Palestinian youth who had attempted to smuggle weapons.   A makeshift gun and bomb were found on the youth, who said during his investigation that he had planned to smuggle the weapons to the other side of the roadblock. (Efrat Weiss)
title: מהזבל לאור הזרקורים בלוס אנג'לס: הרהיטים הממוחזרים של אמיר רווה
